001package ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.model;
002
003public class ModelData {
004    /**
005     * 模型名
006     */
007    public String modelName;
008    /**
009     * 碰撞箱
010     */
011    public ModelHitBox hitbox;
012    /**
013     * 模型默认动作
014     */
015    public DefaultAnimation animation;
016
017    public ModelData(String modelName, ModelHitBox hitbox, DefaultAnimation animation) {
018        this.modelName = modelName;
019        this.hitbox = hitbox;
020        this.animation = animation;
021    }
022
023    public static class ModelHitBox {
024        public double width;
025        public double height;
026
027        public ModelHitBox(double width, double height) {
028            this.width = width;
029            this.height = height;
030        }
031    }
032    public static class DefaultAnimation{
033        public String idle;
034        public String walk;
035        public String jump;
036        public String death;
037
038        public DefaultAnimation(String idle, String walk, String jump, String death) {
039            this.idle = idle;
040            this.walk = walk;
041            this.jump = jump;
042            this.death = death;
043        }
044    }
045}
